api

Interface Proxy<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - type of result to collect
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxyImp

    public interface Proxy<R>
    Define Proxy between Space and Computer
    Author:
    Michael Nekrasov, Roman Kazarin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assignTask(Task<R> task)
      Assign a new task to the associated Computer Queue
      Capabilities getCapabilities()
      Get the capabilities on the associated Computer
      int getId()
      Get Id of this proxy (unique on the space)
      int getNumQueued()
      Get the number of tasks enqued on the associated Computer (running, or in the queue)
      boolean isBufferFull()
      Looks a the capabilites of the associated Computer
      void updateState(SharedState updatedState, boolean force)
      Update the state on the attached Computer

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        Get Id of this proxy (unique on the space)
        Returns:
        the id

      • getCapabilities

        Capabilities getCapabilities()
        Get the capabilities on the associated Computer
        Returns:
        the capabilities

      • updateState

        void updateState(SharedState updatedState,
               boolean force)
        Update the state on the attached Computer
        Parameters:
        updatedState - the new state to send
        force - this update?

      • assignTask

        void assignTask(Task<R> task)
                throws ProxyStoppedException
        Assign a new task to the associated Computer Queue
        Parameters:
        task - to enqueue
        Throws:
        ProxyStoppedException - if proxy is already stopped (for example if computer has disconected)

      • getNumQueued

        int getNumQueued()
        Get the number of tasks enqued on the associated Computer (running, or in the queue)
        Returns:
        the number of queued tasks

      • isBufferFull

        boolean isBufferFull()
        Looks a the capabilites of the associated Computer
        Returns:
        true if maximum number of tasks have been enqueued
